item.title: 从秃鹫到捍卫者，日本私募股权交易迎来创纪录的一年
item.description: 据私募股权基金和顾问称，随着企业屈服于提高投资者回报的压力，今年日本的私有化交易可能会创下历史新高，超过 2023 年的 403 亿美元总额。【原文：Take-private deals in Japan are likely to hit a record high this year, exceeding the $40.3 billion total racked up in 2023, according to private equity funds and advisers, as companies bow to pressure to improve returns for investors.】

item.title: 欧盟汽车团体要求修改 "不再可行 "的汽车二氧化碳排放目标
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商和汽车供应商协会负责人周三表示，欧盟削减汽车二氧化碳排放量的目标（包括到 2035 年将汽车二氧化碳排放量减少 100%）已不再可行。【原文：European Union targets to cut CO2 emissions from vehicles, including a 100% reduction for cars by 2035, are no longer feasible, the heads of the European automobile manufacturers' and automotive suppliers' associations said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国提高关税导致韩国出口增长放缓
item.description: 路透社周三的一项民意调查显示，受与特朗普政府达成贸易协议后美国提高关税的影响，韩国8月份的出口增长可能放缓。【原文：South Korea's export growth likely slowed in August, weighed by higher U.S. tariffs introduced after a trade deal with the Trump administration, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间新闻似曾相识，法国再次陷入危机
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 印美谈判陷入困境是如何导致高关税的？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将对印度商品征收的关税增加一倍，高达50%，这一措施于周三如期生效，使世界上最大的两个民主国家和战略伙伴之间的紧张关系升级。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's doubling of tariffs on goods from India to as much as 50% took effect as scheduled on Wednesday, escalating tensions between the world's two largest democracies and strategic partners.】

item.title: 对冲基金流入摩根士丹利称中国股市有望创 6 个月来最佳对冲基金流入水平
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的一份报告显示，全球对冲基金加大了对中国股市的押注，8月份有望创下自2月份以来最大的月度买盘。【原文：Global hedge funds ramped up their bets on China shares, with August on track to mark the biggest monthly buying since February, a Morgan Stanley note shows.】

item.title: 特朗普对印度进口商品加倍征收关税生效，加剧紧张局势
item.description: 由于印度购买俄罗斯石油而被征收 25% 的惩罚性关税，这是在特朗普之前对来自印度的许多产品征收 25% 关税的基础上增加的关税。【原文：A punitive 25% tariff imposed due to India's purchases of Russian oil adds to Trump's prior 25% tariff on many products from India.】

item.title: 高盛预计到 2026 年底布伦特油价将跌至 50 美元以下
item.description: 高盛预计，由于明年石油过剩增加，到 2026 年底，布伦特原油期货合约价格将下降到每桶 50 美元左右。【原文：Goldman Sachs expects the price of Brent crude futures contracts to decline to the low $50s a barrel by late 2026 due to an increase in the surplus of oil next year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在英伟达事件前持稳；投资者对美联储独立性保持警惕
item.description: 在人工智能领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）发布财报之前，亚洲股市周三持稳，该财报将左右近期的风险情绪。【原文：Asian stocks were steady on Wednesday ahead of an earnings report from AI leader Nvidia that will shape near-term risk sentiment, while the U.S. dollar was frail as investors remained nervous about attacks on Federal Reserve autonomy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 7 月份消费者价格飙升，电费激增
item.description: 由于政府退税的时间安排导致电价飙升，澳大利亚消费者价格在 7 月份的飙升幅度远远超过了预期，这也为今年的消费者价格指数注入了更大的波动性。【原文：Australian consumer prices jumped by far more than forecast in July as electricity prices spiked due to the timing of government rebates, which has injected more volatility into this year's series.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，加拿大鹅收到私有化竞标，估值约为 14 亿美元
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二援引知情人士的话报道，加拿大鹅公司的控股股东贝恩资本（Bain Capital）已经收到了将这家奢侈品制造商私有化的出价，估值约为 14 亿美元。【原文：Canada Goose's controlling shareholder Bain Capital has received bids to take the luxury goods maker private at a valuation of about $1.4 billion, CNBC reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市场等待美国对印度征收关税的影响，油价变化不大
item.description: 油价在上一交易日下跌后，周三变化不大，因为市场正在等待美国对印度（世界第三大原油消费国）新征收的大规模关税，以回应印度购买俄罗斯供应的行为。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Wednesday, after falling in the previous session, as the market awaits massive new U.S. tariffs on India, the world's third-largest crude consumer, in response to its purchases of Russian supply.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴财报可能显示中国科技公司人工智能回报有限
item.description: 中国的阿里巴巴可能会在周五发布的季度财报中强调其人工智能战略，但与腾讯和百度一样，阿里巴巴可能难以证明其在人工智能方面的巨额投资正在产生回报。【原文：China's Alibaba is likely to highlight its artificial intelligence strategy with its quarterly results on Friday, but in line with its peers Tencent and Baidu , may struggle to show that its big AI investments are paying off.】

item.title: 投资者担忧美联储独立性，美元走软
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最近一次试图扩大其对中央银行的权力之后，投资者对美联储独立性的担忧再次削弱了美元汇率，美元汇率在周三奋力上扬。【原文：The dollar struggled to gain ground on Wednesday as renewed investor worries about the Federal Reserve's independence undermined the currency following U.S. President Donald Trump's latest attempt to extend his power over the central bank.】

item.title: 年度盈利和 26 财年展望未达预期，澳大利亚慧科公司业绩下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚物流软件制造商慧科全球（WiseTech Global）周三预计营业利润将低于预期，因为该公司正在处理与收购美国云计算公司e2open有关的成本问题，从而使其股价跌至近四个月的低点。【原文：Australian logistics software maker WiseTech Global forecast lower-than-expected operating earnings on Wednesday, as it navigates costs related to its buyout of U.S. cloud computing firm e2open, sending its shares to a near four-month low.】

item.title: 澳大利亚多米诺比萨公司陷入年度亏损，股价下跌
item.description: 周三，澳大利亚比萨连锁店多米诺比萨企业（Domino's Pizza Enterprises）因其最大的海外市场持续表现不佳而面临全年净亏损的压力，股价跌至近两个月的低点。【原文：Australian pizza chain Domino's Pizza Enterprises swung to a full-year net loss on Wednesday, pressured by continued underperformance in its largest offshore markets, sending its shares to a nearly two-month low.】

item.title: 波音防务部门与罢工机工停止谈判
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）周二称，波音防务公司通知该工会，该公司将在劳动节假期结束后才恢复在圣路易斯的谈判，但没有计划确定谈判日期。【原文：International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers union (IAM) said on Tuesday that Boeing Defense informed the union that the company would not resume negotiations in St. Louis until after the Labor Day holiday, with no plans of a definite date.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，参议院小组准备就特朗普的美联储人选举行听证会
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引一位熟知内情的人士的话报道称，参议院银行委员会将于下周举行听证会，审议美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名白宫经济顾问斯蒂芬-米兰担任美联储理事一事。【原文：The Senate Banking Committee will hold a hearing next week to consider U.S. President Donald Trump's nomination of White House economic adviser Stephen Miran as a Federal Reserve governor, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司的 "星际飞船 "在第 10 次试飞中部署了首批模拟 "星链 "卫星
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索公司（SpaceX）周二发射了其巨型 "星际飞船"（Starship）火箭，进行第十次试飞，旨在克服研发挫折，实现长期追求的技术里程碑，这对火星火箭的可重复使用设计至关重要。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX on Tuesday launched its giant Starship rocket for a tenth test flight aiming to overcome development setbacks and clinch long-sought technical milestones key to the Mars rocket's reusable design.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司因债务豁免问题与贷款人发生争执
item.description: 澳大利亚星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周三表示，该公司正在与贷款方进行讨论，以确保贷款契约的可能豁免，但贷款方迄今为止提出的条件是该赌场运营商无法接受的。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment said on Wednesday it is in discussions with its lenders to secure potential waivers on loan covenants, though the terms offered by the lenders so far were unacceptable to the casino operator.】

item.title: 澳大利亚杂货商伍尔沃斯年度利润下降 19%，2026 财年开局不利
item.description: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯集团（Woolworths Group）周三公布，其全年基本利润下降了 19%，同时报告称，由于其最大的收入来源澳大利亚食品公司（Australian Food）的销售增长低于预期，2026 财年开局不利。【原文：Australia's Woolworths Group posted a 19% drop in its full-year underlying profit on Wednesday, while reporting a weak start to fiscal 2026 on the back of slower-than-expected sales growth in its biggest earner, Australian Food.】

item.title: 萤火虫公司获美国联邦航空局批准恢复阿尔法火箭发射
item.description: 萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）周二表示，该公司已获得美国联邦航空管理局的许可，可以恢复阿尔法火箭的发射。【原文：Firefly Aerospace on Tuesday said it has received clearance from the Federal Aviation Administration to resume Alpha rocket launches, after a technical issue led to a failure in April.】

item.title: 网络安全工具需求激增，Okta上调年度预期
item.description: 网络安全公司Okta周二上调了年度营收和利润预期，押注随着企业加强对人工智能攻击的防御，对其身份验证工具的需求将不断增长。【原文：Cybersecurity company Okta raised annual revenue and profit forecasts on Tuesday, betting on growing demand for its identity verification tools as enterprises strengthen defenses against artificial intelligence-powered attacks.】

item.title: 特朗普瓦解美国风能和太阳能产业的时间表
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）利用他在白宫的第二个任期阻止了风能和太阳能设施的发展，而这些设施是前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）气候和能源议程的基石。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has used his second term in the White House to stymie development of wind and solar energy facilities that were a cornerstone of former President Joe Biden's climate and energy agendas.】

item.title: 8 月中旬，纳斯达克指数的空头兴趣较 7 月下旬上升了 2.02
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所周二表示，8 月中旬纳斯达克股票市场的空头利率上升了 2.02%。【原文：Short interest on the Nasdaq rose 2.02% in mid-August, the exchange said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日 利率前景胜过美联储动荡加深
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美联储理事库克的抵押贷款：已知与未知
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将以 "原因 "为由解除美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的职务，理由是他认为库克在 2021 年办理的两笔抵押贷款中存在 "虚假陈述"，而这距离参议院批准她担任美联储理事的任命还有大约一年时间。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump says he is removing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook for "cause," citing what he said were "false statements" on two mortgages she took out in 2021, about a year before the Senate confirmed her appointment to the Fed.】

item.title: 法官缩小了针对伯克希尔旗下 PacifiCorp 公司的美国野火诉讼范围
item.description: 美国政府对伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下 PacifiCorp 公用事业部门提起诉讼，要求赔偿 2020 年俄勒冈州野火造成的 9 亿多美元损失。【原文：A federal judge on Tuesday dismissed a negligence claim in the U.S. government's lawsuit against Berkshire Hathaway's PacifiCorp utility unit, which seeks more than $900 million in damages stemming from a 2020 wildfire in Oregon.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国司法部正在调查 UnitedHealth 的处方管理服务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部刑事司正在调查联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）旗下药房福利管理公司的商业行为。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department's criminal division is digging into business practices at UnitedHealth Group's pharmacy benefit manager, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会主席卡尔为派拉蒙全球公司与天舞公司的合并批准进行辩护
item.description: 联邦通信委员会主席布兰登-卡尔（Brendan Carr）为该机构批准 Skydance Media 收购 Paramount Global 的审查进行辩护，认为这是例行公事，符合公众利益。【原文：Federal Communications Commission Chairman Brendan Carr defended the agency's review approving Skydance Media's acquisition of Paramount Global as routine and in the public interest.】
